        public JSTarget createTarget(IASProject project,
                    ITargetSettings settings,
                    ITargetProgressMonitor monitor)
        Description copied from interface: IBackend
        Creates a javascript target that will be used to build the compiled javascript source file.
        Specified by:
        createTarget in interface IBackend
        Overrides:
        createTarget in class JSBackend
        Parameters:
        project - The current ICompilerProject.
        settings - The target's custom settings.
        monitor - The compilation monitor used during asynchronous parsing of ICompilationUnits.
        Returns:
        A new JSTarget used during compilation.
